name: Es Kepal Milo
description:
Es Kepal Milo is fun casual game that need hand speed and concentration.

Es Kepal Milo is very engaging casual game at Android Playstore.

Features:

+ Easy to play

+ Free to play

+ Online Leaderboard to compete with other player real time world wide!

+ Nice Graphic Design

+ Nice BGM

How To Play:

- Tap the Es Kepal Milo, Pen Pineapple and Apple

- Avoid the Face and Cyanide Coffee

- Pen : ( +1 timer)

- Es Kepal Milo : ( +1 timer)

- Pineapple : (+1 score)

- Apple : (+1 score)

- Face (-2 timer)

- Cyanide Coffee (-2 score)

Es Kepal Milo is pure entertainment.

Please contact us via email if there are any error and/or violation againts the provisions of third party.

Take a time to RATE and COMMENT after install, your opinion will help us improve our app.
